info.title: Trust Guard - AI Reliability Solution
info.description: Detects and mitigates seven AI failure patterns: hallucination, drift, bias, deception, security theater, duplication, and stub syndrome

get.description: Get Prometheus metrics in text format.

example.text: The AI is now safe and secure with 100% trustworthiness.
